title: Provide Product via Compassionate Use
description: A physician requests access to an investigational drug for a seriously ill patient who is not eligible for a clinical trial (compassionate use).

tasks.description: Receive and log the compassionate use request from the physician.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the request in the appropriate system.

tasks.description: Route the request to an internal review committee to assess the medical rationale and ethical considerations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent routes the request for review.

tasks.description: If approved, submit the request to the appropriate regulatory authority (e.g., as a single-patient IND to the FDA).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent prepares and submits the required regulatory paperwork.

tasks.description: Once approved by regulators, coordinate the shipment of the drug to the physician.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a shipment order for the investigational drug.
